articles.title: Rihanna Drops ‘Lift Me Up,’ Her First Single in Six Years, From ‘Black Panther: Wakanda Forever’ - Variety
articles.description: Rihanna dropped her first single in six years on Thursday night: “Lift Me Up,” the first track to emerge from Marvel’s blockbuster sequel “Black Panther: Wakanda Forever.” The song, a tribute to the life and legacy of Chadwick Boseman, was written by Nigerian…
articles.content:
